title: Ticket #7756: startd runs scripts for excluded machine resources
description:
Right now, if you have 

MACHINE_RESOURCE_NAMES = foo
MACHINE_RESOURCE_INVENTORY_bar = some/path

The startd will execute some/path on start-up, which at best violates the principle of least astonishment.

Instead, we should pull the list of names on which to call init_machine_resource() from MACHINE_RESOURCE_NAMES, and only use the regex code to generate that list if MACHINE_RESOURCE_NAMES is unset (according to the code's current definition).
